WAF - Allowed vs Blocked Requests on ALB & APIGW

targets.expression: SUM(SEARCH('AWS/WAFV2 MetricName=("SampleBlockedRequest" OR "SampleAllowedRequest" OR "SampleCaptchaRequest" OR "SampleChallengeRequest") BotCategory="ALL_BOTS" Region="us-west-2" WebACL="friends-capstone-regional-web-acl" VerificationStatus="bot:verified" :aws.AccountId=LOCAL', 'Sum', 3600))
targets.label: Bots:Verified

targets.expression: SUM(SEARCH('AWS/WAFV2 MetricName=("SampleBlockedRequest" OR "SampleAllowedRequest" OR "SampleCaptchaRequest" OR "SampleChallengeRequest") BotCategory="ALL_BOTS" Region="us-west-2" WebACL="friends-capstone-regional-web-acl" VerificationStatus="bot:developer_platform:verified" :aws.AccountId=LOCAL', 'Sum', 3600))
targets.label: Bots:DeveloperPlatform

targets.expression: SUM(SEARCH('AWS/WAFV2 MetricName=("SampleBlockedRequest" OR "SampleAllowedRequest" OR "SampleCaptchaRequest" OR "SampleChallengeRequest") BotCategory="ALL_BOTS" Region="us-west-2" WebACL="friends-capstone-regional-web-acl" VerificationStatus="bot:user_triggered:verified" :aws.AccountId=LOCAL', 'Sum', 3600))
targets.label: Bots:UserTriggered:Verified

targets.expression: SUM(SEARCH('AWS/WAFV2 MetricName=("SampleBlockedRequest" OR "SampleAllowedRequest" OR "SampleCaptchaRequest" OR "SampleChallengeRequest") BotCategory="ALL_BOTS" Region="us-west-2" WebACL="friends-capstone-regional-web-acl" VerificationStatus="bot:unverified" :aws.AccountId=LOCAL', 'Sum', 3600))
targets.label: Bots:Unverified

targets.expression: SUM(SEARCH('AWS/WAFV2 MetricName=("SampleBlockedRequest" OR "SampleAllowedRequest" OR "SampleCaptchaRequest" OR "SampleChallengeRequest") BotCategory="NON_BOT" Region="us-west-2" WebACL="friends-capstone-regional-web-acl" :aws.AccountId=LOCAL', 'Sum', 3600))
targets.label: Non-bots

targets.expression: SUM(SEARCH('{AWS/WAFV2,Signal,Region,WebACL} MetricName=("SampleBlockedRequest" OR "SampleAllowedRequest" OR "SampleCaptchaRequest" OR "SampleChallengeRequest") Region="us-west-2" WebACL="friends-capstone-regional-web-acl" Signal="non_browser_user_agent" :aws.AccountId=LOCAL', 'Sum', 3600))
targets.label: NonBrowserUserAgent

targets.expression: SUM(SEARCH('{AWS/WAFV2,Signal,Region,WebACL} MetricName=("SampleBlockedRequest" OR "SampleAllowedRequest" OR "SampleCaptchaRequest" OR "SampleChallengeRequest") Region="us-west-2" WebACL="friends-capstone-regional-web-acl" Signal="known_bot_data_center" :aws.AccountId=LOCAL', 'Sum', 3600))
targets.label: KnownBotDataCenter

targets.expression: SUM(SEARCH('{AWS/WAFV2,Signal,Region,WebACL} MetricName=("SampleBlockedRequest" OR "SampleAllowedRequest" OR "SampleCaptchaRequest" OR "SampleChallengeRequest") Region="us-west-2" WebACL="friends-capstone-regional-web-acl" Signal="automated_browser" :aws.AccountId=LOCAL', 'Sum', 3600))
targets.label: AutomatedBrowser

targets.expression: SUM(SEARCH('AWS/WAFV2 MetricName=("SampleBlockedRequest" OR "SampleAllowedRequest" OR "SampleCaptchaRequest" OR "SampleChallengeRequest") BotCategory="bot:category:miscellaneous" Region="us-west-2" WebACL="friends-capstone-regional-web-acl" :aws.AccountId=LOCAL', 'Sum', 3600))
targets.label: Miscellaneous

targets.expression: SUM(SEARCH('AWS/WAFV2 MetricName=("SampleBlockedRequest" OR "SampleAllowedRequest" OR "SampleCaptchaRequest" OR "SampleChallengeRequest") BotCategory="bot:category:http_library" Region="us-west-2" WebACL="friends-capstone-regional-web-acl" :aws.AccountId=LOCAL', 'Sum', 3600))

targets.expression: SUM(SEARCH('AWS/WAFV2 MetricName=("SampleBlockedRequest" OR "SampleAllowedRequest" OR "SampleCaptchaRequest" OR "SampleChallengeRequest") BotCategory="bot:category:monitoring" Region="us-west-2" WebACL="friends-capstone-regional-web-acl" :aws.AccountId=LOCAL', 'Sum', 3600))
